keyword: how many calories in a baconator
title: How Many Calories in a Baconator?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a baconator from Wendy's, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Baconator?
assumptions: Standard Wendy's Baconator: two beef patties, six bacon strips, American cheese, ketchup, mayo, on a bun; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations; values based on standard U.S. Wendy's data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A single Baconator burger contains 970 calories and 57 g of protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Upgrade to Double Baconator (extra patty and bacon)

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Wendy's Baconator?
faqs.a: Approximately 970 calories for the standard single Baconator.

faqs.q: What's the protein content in a Baconator?
faqs.a: About 57 g of protein per Baconator burger.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Baconator?
faqs.a: Around 2310 mg of sodium, mostly from bacon and cheese.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a Baconator?
faqs.a: Yes, 51 g total carbs, including 2 g fiber and 11 g sugars from the bun and condiments.

faqs.q: Does customizing a Baconator change calories?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”removing sauces saves ~80 kcal; adding extras like more bacon increases it significantly.
